text: Jack Ong (November 6, 1940 - June 13, 2017) was an American actor, writer, activist and marketing professional. He was born in Mesa, Arizona. He was known for his roles in Next (2007) and Akeelah the Bee (2005). He also appeared in Cold Case, ER, Friends, The Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The Bernie Mac Show, Still Standing, Dharma & Greg, Touched by an Angel, V.I.P., Chicago Hope, The Simpsons and Beverly Hills, 90210. Ong died from complications of brain cancer in California on June 13, 2017 at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * * JackOng.com * HaingNgorFoundation.org Category:1940 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:People from Mesa, Arizona Category:Actors from Arizona
title: Jack Ong
